name: CVG_CCS_AUTH
description: Table to extract California Children's Services (CCS) authorization information.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the coverage record. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reportingï¿½s encryption utility.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number used to identify each row of California Children's Services (CCS) authorization information for a coverage record.

columns.name: CCS_AUTH_NUM
columns.description: Stores the Authorization Numbers for California Children's Services (CCS).

columns.name: CCS_EFF_FROM_DT
columns.description: Stores the effective from date for a California Children's Services (CCS) Authorization Number.

columns.name: CCS_EFF_TO_DT
columns.description: Stores the effective to date for a California Children's Services (CCS) Authorization Number.

columns.name: CCS_AUTH_PROV
columns.description: Stores the authorized provider for a given California Children's Services (CCS) Authorization Number.
